content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (x)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at Position (x1)
- Boiler at Position (x2)
- Offshore Pump at Position (x3)

### Copper Plate Mine at Position (y)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at Position (y1) and a Furnace at Position (y2)
- Burner Mining Drill at Position (y3) and a Furnace at Position (y4)
- Burner Mining Drill at Position (y5) and a Furnace at Position (y6)

### Copper Cable Factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at Position (z1) and a Furnace at Position (z2)
- Assembling Machine at Position (z3) and Inserter at Position (z4) that puts into the Assembling Machine
- Beltgroup at Position (z5) that connects the Furnace at Position (z2) to the Assembling Machine at Position (z3)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when Using Extracting but Being Too Far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when Placing into a Tile Which is Occupied by Another Entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors in Incorrect API Usage
- Verify that the API calls are used with the correct parameters and in the correct sequence to avoid unexpected behaviors.

### Errors in Misplaced Objects
- Double-check the placement coordinates before placing objects to ensure they are positioned correctly and do not overlap with existing structures.
